title: Judwaa 2
summary: Twin brothers born to an honest businessman are separated at birth when their father exposes a smuggling racket and a king pin. One of the brothers is thought to be dead but only resurfaces stronger after living life on the streets to reunite with his family over a sequence of events and twist of fate. Genetically bound by reflexes both theTwin brothers born to an honest businessman are separated at birth when their father exposes a smuggling racket and a king pin. One of the brothers is thought to be dead but only resurfaces stronger after living life on the streets to reunite with his family over a sequence of events and twist of fate. Genetically bound by reflexes both the brother’s lives interlink in strange ways and a comedy of errors. They eventually come together to destroy the smuggling nexus and save their family from a downfall that awaits them.… Expand

reviews.content: Varun Dhawan's impressive dual performance as well as some hilarious moments can't save "Judwaa 2" from a plot that doesn't make sense, terrible villains, lame songs, scattershot humour, bad directing, unsatisfactory editing, and a slipshodVarun Dhawan's impressive dual performance as well as some hilarious moments can't save "Judwaa 2" from a plot that doesn't make sense, terrible villains, lame songs, scattershot humour, bad directing, unsatisfactory editing, and a slipshod script. There is some enjoyment to be had, but leave your brains out of the theatre.
